resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158144</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158144</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2759</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Clocks</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Taktgeber</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Horloges</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pulsos de disparo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Orologi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">"Ενδείξεις ώρασ"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Relojes</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An interactive animation which allows the user to rotate the hands of a clock to a chosen time, and to compare this to the time as indicated on a digital clock</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">physics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mechanics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">clocks</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">time</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine interaktive Animation, die dem Benutzer 
erlaubt, die Hände eines Taktgebers zu einer gewählten Zeit zu 
drehen und dieses mit der Zeit vergleichen, wie auf einer Digitaluhr 
angezeigt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation interactive qui permet à 
l'utilisateur de tourner les mains d'une horloge jusqu à un temps 
choisi, et pour comparer ceci au temps comme indiqué sur un pendule 
à lecture digitale</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation interativo que permita que o usuário
gire as mãos de um pulso de disparo a uma estadia escolhida, e para 
comparar isto ao tempo como indicado em um pulso de disparo digital</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione interattiva che permette che 
l'utente ruoti le mani di un orologio ad un tempo scelto e confrontare
questo al tempo come indicato su un orologio digitale</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια διαλογική ζωτικότητα που επιτρέπει στο χρήστη για 
να περιστραφεί τα χέρια ενός ρολογιού σε έναν επιλεγμένο χρόνο,
και για να συγκρίνει αυτό με το χρόνο όπως υποδεικνύεται σε ένα 
ψηφιακό ρολόι</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación interactiva que permite que el 
utilizador rote las manos de un reloj a un rato elegido, y comparar 
esto al tiempo según lo indicado en un reloj digital</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mechaniker</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Taktgeber</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mécanique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">horloges</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">temps</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mecânicos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pulsos de disparo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tempo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fisica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">meccanici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">orologi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">tempo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φυσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μηχανικοί</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ρολόγια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χρόνος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">mecánicos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">relojes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">tiempo</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>

            <value>final</value>
          </status>
          <contribute>
